document.full_text: the u.s. government is using unmanned drones to scout for violent drug gangs in mexico, the new york times said on wednesday, in an aggressive tactic that could raise sensitive sovereignty questions.
document.title: u.s. drones scout mexico for drug gangs: report
lines_and_colors: the u.s. government is using unmanned drones to scout for violent drug gangs in mexico, the new york times said on wednesday, in an aggressive tactic that could raise sensitive sovereignty questions.
